Lawmaker misleads in claims about Oroville dam crisis

   IFrame
   Republican state Assemblyman Travis Allen recently claimed the Oroville
   Dam emergency in Northern California "was entirely avoidable."

"The Oroville dam failure was entirely avoidable: California passed a $7.5
   Billion water bond in 2014 but Jerry Brown didn't spend $1 on new water
   storage or improvements to existing infrastructure like Oroville," Allen
   said in a press release on Feb. 13, 2017.
